description: Outgoing Kazumi Asakura is the resident ace reporter of 2-A. The spunky news-hound is always ready with a camera to capture the action, and definitely knows a hot scoop when she sees one! Upon discovering the name Sayo Asakura on the class roll, the redhead decides to dig up the dirt on her seemingly missing classmate. The story she finds might cause her to rethink her paparazzi style. Even better, what the intrepid reporter uncovers might finally release the mysterious Sayo from her strange wallflower limbo!
name: Asakura Kazumi
